programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: The Heroic Trio
programme.desc: Newborn babies destined to be emperors are kidnapped by the Evil Master. The police are powerless, so the city must be saved by three women with superb fighting skills.

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: A special agent from the Japanese National Security teams up with a skilled thief to find a pair of plates used to make counterfeit USD.

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: In this classic martial arts comedy, Sammo Hung stars as Lam Sai Wing, the disciple of Wong Fei Hung, who gets embroiled in a feud with a rival kung fu school.

programme.title: Blind Detective
programme.desc: A blind former detective, who possesses an uncanny ability to solve cold cases for police reward, teams up with a hit team detective in search of her missing friend.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented grannys apartment as a stakeout end up developing romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Widow Warriors
programme.desc: When the men in a triad family are betrayed and gunned down by a rival gang, their wives decide to take revenge for the death of their husbands.

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: The Best of Best
programme.desc: Jie has joined SDU and vows to uphold law and justice. As Jie falls in love with the daughter of a triad boss who killed his father, he is torn between love and family...

programme.title: Breaking News
programme.desc: A botched police stand-off with a gang of criminals is captured by TV cameras and broadcast live on TV, adding to the woes of the police attempting to nail these bad guys!

programme.title: The Moon Warrior
programme.desc: A benevolent fisherman living a simple life is reluctantly drawn into helping a noble emperor regain his throne from his evil brother.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses martial arts skill founded by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels intending to dominate the world.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: Century of the Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover detective is assigned to take down a triad boss, but as their friendship develops over time, the detective is torn between duty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, imperial guard Ocean secretly frees a kind monster gifted by Brunei, sparking a palace bounty and a frantic hunt to capture it.

programme.title: 3AM The Campsite
programme.desc: A group of friends going on a camping trip inside a haunted forest encounters a series of paranormal events. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: While Fang, a Ming royal guard, pursues an evil rapist, they are accidentally frozen. Thawed out to modern-day Hong Kong, Fang continues his pursuit to uphold justice.

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: When a Hong Kong policewoman, a Japanese detective and a security officer foil a plane hijacking attempt, they incur the wrath of the hijackers who are out for vengeance.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Angels
programme.desc: A spoiled girl is transferred to a new sports school where she meets a handsome kung fu team captain and decides to try wushu. Little does she know that would change her life...

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Fatty helps his friend Wah to learn martial arts from his Wing Chun master, so that Wah can take down the villains and avenge his mothers death.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: Five bounty hunters are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings plaguing a hotel group in Bangkok. Can they solve the crime and finally collect the bounty?

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: Monkey King emerges after Goddess Nuwas sacrifice to challenge the Jade Emperor, causing chaos that enables Buffalo Demon to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Playboy Cops
programme.desc: Two eccentric young detectives, Lincoln and Michael, go in search of a killer to bring him to justice, while vying for the affections of a young woman.

programme.title: Yesterday Once More
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs To, a pair of divorced professional jewel thieves, target to steal the same ruby necklace. A cat-and-mouse game begins as their love re-blossoms along the way.

programme.desc: In Barrydale staan die historiese Langhuis van Gert van de Merwe en Jaco Jansen van Rensburg. Hulle interieur bestaan uit versamelaars-elemente, n weerspieëling van hulle smaak.

programme.title: Lat Wiel
programme.desc: Ons skop die seisoen af met n peperduur Land Rover Defender, die Octa weergawe, en Hannes se hare waai deurmekaar in n afslaankap.

programme.title: Schuster
programme.desc: Leon Schuster het oor die jare n wye verskeidenheid mense met sy poetse uitgevang. Ons kyk terug na van sy gewildstes tydens sy radio- en fliekjare en gesels met diegene wat self sleg gevang was.

programme.title: Boer Soek n Vrou
programme.desc: As mens deel raak van n boer se lewe, raak jy ook deel van die omgewing. Reandi besoek n paar NGOs en plekke in nood met die pasmaats. Kan die pasmaats hulself hier sien aanpas?

programme.title: Prontuit
programme.desc: Prontuit verken Suid-Afrika se ryk geskiedenis van fossiele en dinosourusse. Ons besoek twee nuwe toerisme sentrums en ondersoek hoe paleontologie ons ekonomie kan stimmuleer.

programme.title: Jou Mase Taal
programme.desc: Die politiek rondom Afrikaans raak al haar mense. Die taal bring ongemaklike en dringende vrae op. Ons kyk ook na die ingewikkelde geskiedenis van die taal en wat die pad vorentoe is.

programme.title: Vlug Na Egipte
programme.desc: Dominee vra Hennie n groot guns, en Lena probeer stilletjies haar bene rek. n Begrafnis op die dorp ontlok beide simpatie en kritiek by die Karoliete.

programme.title: OppieStoep
programme.desc: Pietman en Lyntjie kuier saam met Andries Vermeulen, Hannes van Wyk en Jacques De Wet by OppieStoep. Schalk Joubert maak musiek saam met Robin Auld.

programme.title: Slank
programme.desc: Anja kry haar lyf reg vir optrede op die verhoog, daar word n verloofring aan een van die deelnemers se vingers gesit en Jimmy Abbott trek na jare weer sy Springbok-baadjie aan.

programme.title: Dankie, Lottoland
programme.desc: Masincedane Dagsentrum is n ligtoring in Heidelberg. Aktrise Marijke Coetser kuier daar en deel Lottoland-verrassings uit wat hul toekomsdrome verbreed en n lid se lewe verander.

programme.title: Koortjies Met Elwira Standili
programme.desc: Akteur en TV-aanbieder Chanelle Davids-Abrahams vertel hoe sy en haar man n gesonde gesin bou. Pastoor Shaun van Rensburg deel advies. Dan bederf Winston Siljeur en Lady Ivanita ons met musiek.

programme.title: Die Boodskap: Vir Jou Lewensreis
programme.desc: Inspirasie vir jou lewensreis vanuit Mosaïek gemeente. Saam met Johan Heystek verken ons dat God gee wat ons nou nodig het.

programme.title: Hopla
programme.desc: Hip, Hop, Flip en Flop is vier hasies wat speel-speel saam met die maatjies by die huis die Hopla-wereld ontdek. Saam met die maatjies by die huis leer hul oulike lessies.

programme.title: Bravo!
programme.desc: Ons kuier by akteur Geon Nel van Mooiweer en Warm. Wys jou wat gebeur op die stel van Nicholis Louw se nuwe musiekvideo en leer ken die nuwe studente-sangeres van Potchefstroom, Anzelle.

programme.title: Villa Rosa
programme.desc: Wat is die verband tussen Natasha en Rebecca? Gaan Portia uiteindelik haar geheime bewonderaar leer ken? Villa Rosa se mense stem oor watter idee die beste is - wie gaan wen Charl of Ben?

programme.title: Getroud Met Rugby
programme.desc: Die groot wedstryd is vanaand, Stryders teen die Orcas. Tommie 101 kry baie aandag. Gideon meng in met Reitz se liefdeslewe. Renate se drome word waar.

programme.title: Arendsvlei
programme.desc: Janice beskuldig vir Lee-Roy en Thys dat hulle saam met Lionel teen haar saamsweer. Kyle laat weet vir Beatrice en Clint dat hoofkantoor n laaste geheime missie vir Clint het.

programme.desc: Tim is bekommerd oor Rita se kunshandelaar terwyl Siya wonder oor Orpa se invloed op sy gemeentelede. Rhafiek weier om AB se Gadat by te woon en dit lei tot ernstige gevolge.

programme.title: Vuurwarm
programme.desc: Al die nuutste en beste musiekvideos van jou gunsteling kunstenaars bymekaar.

programme.title: Country
programme.desc: Dans en sing saam met van jou gunsteling Country songs - van Ricus Nel tot Roan Ash en alles tussen in!

programme.title: Luisternet
programme.desc: Kom luister saam na jou gunsteling Afrikaanse liedjies. Afrikaanse musiek. Lekker musiek. Die hele dag lank. Kom luister net!

programme.title: Deurnag!
programme.desc: Kom #deurnag saam met ons.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: Dylan OBrien leads this sci-fi thriller. When a girl disappears on Caddo Lake, a series of past deaths and disappearances begin to link together, altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Maxxxine
programme.desc: The gruesome third instalment in the X trilogy. Years after surviving a massacre, adult film star Maxine Minx leaps to mainstream fame, but her big break is being threatened.

programme.title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story
programme.desc: A powerful, sincere documentary about actor Christopher Reeve, who became quadriplegic and subsequently worked as a disability rights advocate.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Tatiana Suarez
programme.desc: A hard-hitting documentary. The incredible story of Tatiana Suarez, who overcame a broken neck and cancer to return to Mixed Martial Arts, and be one of the best fighters.

programme.title: The Lost Girls
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic tale of Peter Pan, but with a feminist twist. Four generations of Darling women struggle with the aftermath of their adventures in Neverland.

programme.title: Cassino In Ischia
programme.desc: Expect a hilarious journey of mishaps, reinvention, and unexpected discoveries. An out-of-favour action star tries to revive his career and travels to Italy to film an action movie.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: A feel-good animation. A goofy streetwise cat has the perfect money-making scam that involves a dumb-looking, pipe-playing kid and a horde of strangely literate rats.

programme.title: Gracie and Pedro: Pets To The Rescue
programme.desc: A fun, furry animated adventure. Family frenemies, Gracie and Pedro, must put their differences aside, embarking on a thrilling quest in order to reunite with their owners.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: An epic animated adventure for the whole family. Two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey, where they make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Po is chosen to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace in the fourth instalment. He must train a new Dragon Warrior while a wicked sorceress plans to re-summon master villains.

programme.title: Flight Risk
programme.desc: Things are not as they appear in this thriller from Mel Gibson. On a small plane, a US Marshal escorts a government witness, but the pilot (Mark Wahlberg) turns out to be an assassin.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: A riveting action comedy. A realtor is pulled back into his old life by his former partner-in-crime. With his crime-lord brother also on his trail, he must confront his past.

programme.title: High Rollers
programme.desc: The risks are twice as high in this sequel to the 2024 crime action. Mason (John Travolta) and his crew attempt a high-stakes casino heist to save his kidnapped girlfriend.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: Michael Fassbender faces the ultimate test of loyalty in this espionage thriller. An intelligence officer is tasked with finding a mole, only to find his wife is a suspect.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Action star Frank Grillo leads an all-star cast in this slugfest. Trapped in a time loop that repeats the day of his murder, a former special-ops agent must uncover how he died.

programme.title: Black Balsam
programme.desc: A thriller filled with twists and turns. A couple finds their dream home. But dreams turn to nightmares when the deceased owners son takes revenge on the new owners.

programme.title: Alex Edelman: Just For Us
programme.desc: After an acclaimed, extended run on Broadway, comedian Alex Edelman brings his solo show to HBO in an all-new comedy special.

programme.title: Sins In The Family
programme.desc: A gripping family drama. Zaras perfect life crumbles when her adopted daughters counsellor confesses she is her daughters birth mom.

programme.title: The Edge Of Existence

programme.title: Why Cant My Life Be A Rom Com?

programme.title: Rearview Mirror

programme.title: Million To One

programme.title: Stomp The Yard

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Tim Burton and Michael Keaton team up to make a creepy, dark, fun experience. A recently deceased couple hire a sleazy ghost to get rid of their homes new occupants.

programme.desc: Peter Jackson brings J.R.R. Tolkiens classic to life. A hobbit embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

programme.title: Cradle 2 The Grave

programme.title: Blacklight
